title: Esport Wars? Zwift Launches Competition to Rival MyWhoosh and UCI’s World Championships
content:
Zwift hits back with big-prize, multi-format 'Games' after losing tender for UCI worlds, promises 'biggest cycling Esport competition to date'.

Read the full article at Esport Wars? Zwift Launches Competition to Rival MyWhoosh and UCI’s World Championships on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
